23namespace v8 {
24namespace internal {
25
26using YoungGenerationMainMarkingVisitor = YoungGenerationMarkingVisitor<
27 YoungGenerationMarkingVisitationMode::kParallel>;
28
29class YoungGenerationRememberedSetsMarkingWorklist {
30 private:
31 class MarkingItem;
32
33 public:
34 class Local {
35 public:
36 explicit Local(YoungGenerationRememberedSetsMarkingWorklist* handler)
37 : handler_(handler) {}
38
39 template <typename Visitor>
40 bool ProcessNextItem(Visitor* visitor) {
41 return handler_->ProcessNextItem(visitor, index_);
42 }
43
44 private:
45 YoungGenerationRememberedSetsMarkingWorklist* const handler_;
46 base::Optional<size_t> index_;
47 };
48
49 static std::vector<MarkingItem> CollectItems(Heap* heap);
50
51 explicit YoungGenerationRememberedSetsMarkingWorklist(Heap* heap);
52 ~YoungGenerationRememberedSetsMarkingWorklist();
53
54 size_t RemainingRememberedSetsMarkingIteams() const {
55 return remaining_remembered_sets_marking_items_.load(
56 std::memory_order_relaxed);
57 }
58
59 void TearDown();
60
61 private:
62 class MarkingItem : public ParallelWorkItem {
63 public:
64 enum class SlotsType { kRegularSlots, kTypedSlots };
65
66 MarkingItem(MutablePageMetadata* chunk, SlotsType slots_type,
67 SlotSet* slot_set, SlotSet* background_slot_set)
68 : chunk_(chunk),
69 slots_type_(slots_type),
70 slot_set_(slot_set),
71 background_slot_set_(background_slot_set) {}
72 MarkingItem(MutablePageMetadata* chunk, SlotsType slots_type,
73 TypedSlotSet* typed_slot_set)
74 : chunk_(chunk),
75 slots_type_(slots_type),
76 typed_slot_set_(typed_slot_set) {}
77 ~MarkingItem() = default;
78
79 template <typename Visitor>
80 void Process(Visitor* visitor);
81 void MergeAndDeleteRememberedSets();
82 void DeleteRememberedSets();
83
84 void DeleteSetsOnTearDown();
85
86 private:
87 inline Heap* heap() { return chunk_->heap(); }
88
89 template <typename Visitor>
90 void MarkUntypedPointers(Visitor* visitor);
91 template <typename Visitor>
92 void MarkTypedPointers(Visitor* visitor);
93 template <typename Visitor, typename TSlot>
94 V8_INLINE SlotCallbackResult CheckAndMarkObject(Visitor* visitor,
95 TSlot slot);
96
97 MutablePageMetadata* const chunk_;
98 const SlotsType slots_type_;
99 union {
100 SlotSet* slot_set_;
101 TypedSlotSet* typed_slot_set_;
102 };
103 SlotSet* background_slot_set_ = nullptr;
104 };
105
106 template <typename Visitor>
107 bool ProcessNextItem(Visitor* visitor, base::Optional<size_t>& index);
108
109 std::vector<MarkingItem> remembered_sets_marking_items_;
110 std::atomic_size_t remaining_remembered_sets_marking_items_;
111 IndexGenerator remembered_sets_marking_index_generator_;
112};
113
114class YoungGenerationRootMarkingVisitor final : public RootVisitor {
115 public:
116 explicit YoungGenerationRootMarkingVisitor(
117 YoungGenerationMainMarkingVisitor* main_marking_visitor);
118 ~YoungGenerationRootMarkingVisitor();
119
120 V8_INLINE void VisitRootPointer(Root root, const char* description,
121 FullObjectSlot p) final;
122
123 V8_INLINE void VisitRootPointers(Root root, const char* description,
124 FullObjectSlot start,
125 FullObjectSlot end) final;
126
127 GarbageCollector collector() const override {
128 return GarbageCollector::MINOR_MARK_SWEEPER;
129 }
130
131 private:
132 template <typename TSlot>
133 void VisitPointersImpl(Root root, TSlot start, TSlot end);
134
135 YoungGenerationMainMarkingVisitor* const main_marking_visitor_;
136};
137
138// Collector for young-generation only.
139class MinorMarkSweepCollector final {
140 public:
141 static constexpr size_t kMaxParallelTasks = 8;
142
143 explicit MinorMarkSweepCollector(Heap* heap);
144 ~MinorMarkSweepCollector();
145
146 void TearDown();
147 void CollectGarbage();
148 void StartMarking(bool force_use_background_threads);
149
150 void RequestGC();
151
152 EphemeronRememberedSet::TableList* ephemeron_table_list() const {
153 return ephemeron_table_list_.get();
154 }
155
156 MarkingWorklists* marking_worklists() { return marking_worklists_.get(); }
157
158 MarkingWorklists::Local* local_marking_worklists() {
159 return &main_marking_visitor_->marking_worklists_local();
160 }
161
162 YoungGenerationRememberedSetsMarkingWorklist*
163 remembered_sets_marking_handler() {
164 DCHECK_NOT_NULL(remembered_sets_marking_handler_);
165 return remembered_sets_marking_handler_.get();
166 }
167
168 YoungGenerationMainMarkingVisitor* main_marking_visitor() {
169 return main_marking_visitor_.get();
170 }
171
172 bool is_in_atomic_pause() const {
173 return is_in_atomic_pause_.load(std::memory_order_relaxed);
174 }
175
176 bool gc_finalization_requsted() const {
177 return gc_finalization_requested_.load(std::memory_order_relaxed);
178 }
179
180 bool UseBackgroundThreadsInCycle() const {
181 return use_background_threads_in_cycle_.value();
182 }
183
184 private:
185 using ResizeNewSpaceMode = Heap::ResizeNewSpaceMode;
186
187 class RootMarkingVisitor;
188
189 Sweeper* sweeper() { return sweeper_; }
190
191 void MarkLiveObjects();
192 void MarkRoots(YoungGenerationRootMarkingVisitor& root_visitor,
193 bool was_marked_incrementally);
194 void DrainMarkingWorklist();
195 void MarkRootsFromTracedHandles(
196 YoungGenerationRootMarkingVisitor& root_visitor);
197 void MarkRootsFromConservativeStack(
198 YoungGenerationRootMarkingVisitor& root_visitor);
199 void EvacuateExternalPointerReferences(MutablePageMetadata* p);
200
201 void TraceFragmentation();
202 void ClearNonLiveReferences();
203 void FinishConcurrentMarking();
204 // Perform Wrapper Tracing if in use.
205 void PerformWrapperTracing();
206
207 void Sweep();
208 // 'StartSweepNewSpace' and 'SweepNewLargeSpace' return true if any pages were
209 // promoted.
210 bool StartSweepNewSpace();
211 void StartSweepNewSpaceWithStickyBits();
212 bool SweepNewLargeSpace();
213
214 void Finish();
215
216 Heap* const heap_;
217
218 std::unique_ptr<MarkingWorklists> marking_worklists_;
219
220 std::unique_ptr<EphemeronRememberedSet::TableList> ephemeron_table_list_;
221 std::unique_ptr<YoungGenerationMainMarkingVisitor> main_marking_visitor_;
222
223 MarkingState* const marking_state_;
224 NonAtomicMarkingState* const non_atomic_marking_state_;
225 Sweeper* const sweeper_;
226
227 std::unique_ptr<PretenuringHandler::PretenuringFeedbackMap>
228 pretenuring_feedback_;
229
230 std::unique_ptr<YoungGenerationRememberedSetsMarkingWorklist>
231 remembered_sets_marking_handler_;
232
233 ResizeNewSpaceMode resize_new_space_ = ResizeNewSpaceMode::kNone;
234
235 base::Optional<bool> use_background_threads_in_cycle_;
236
237 std::atomic<bool> is_in_atomic_pause_{false};
238 std::atomic<bool> gc_finalization_requested_{false};
239
240 friend class IncrementalMarking;
241};
242
243} // namespace internal
244} // namespace v8
